page.title: 11TOURISM
page.content: Because of our close proximity to the ancient city of York and because we are on the main railway route and close to major motorways we are in the centre of one country's major tourist areas.Naburn has 4 camp sites,a marina ,a public house and a banqueting hall. Acaster Malbis has a thriving river_ side public house 5 camp and caravan sites and a beautiful guest house to accomedate visitors to the area.Cop_ manthorpe,as yet,has no facilities for tourism although it does have two public houses which attracts passing as well as local trade.There are often long queues along the A64 motorway in the summertime when traffic gets conjested on it's way to York or to the East coastal resorts of Scar_ borough,Filey and Bridlington.
